name: Hungry Snake (Jonathan Steadman)
description:
Open source and free snake game clone.

Lightweight and easy snake game for Linux.

Its still in BETA but stable version is coming out in: 13th of August 2022.

Its supported for 2 years. 2022 - 2024.

Requirements:

The latest version of you Linux distribution.

2gb of Ram.

OpenGL 1.0 is needed to run the game.

That is all you need. :)

Thanks Jonathan Steadman.
